title: league making pc turn off?
body:
So lately (past 2 days) every time i go into a ranked game it loads up then once the game begins my computer will turn off.

This only happens when i'm playing  a ranked game.

I can play aram and it works fine, i can also play hours of cs go or what ever game i want without a problem but as soon as i Que up for ranked it turns off!!   I have lost LP and i'm now on a 10 min LOW PRIORITY QUEUE 

Any ideas?
